name: kiro-cloud-auth
description: Kiro-Cloud-Auth - 轻量级 Kiro 云端账号管理客户端
author: Kiro-Cloud-Auth

scripts.build:cloud: cross-env NODE_ENV=production USE_HARD_LINKS=false electron-vite build --mode build && electron-builder --win nsis --config.directories.output=release
scripts.build:cloud:portable: cross-env NODE_ENV=production USE_HARD_LINKS=false electron-vite build --mode build && electron-builder --win portable --config.directories.output=release
scripts.build:win:remote:setup: cross-env NODE_ENV=production USE_HARD_LINKS=false electron-vite build --mode build && electron-builder --win nsis --config.directories.output=release
scripts.build:win:remote:zip: cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-vite build --mode build && electron-builder --win zip --config.directories.output=release
scripts.build:win:remote:portable: cross-env NODE_ENV=production USE_HARD_LINKS=false electron-vite build --mode build && electron-builder --win portable --config.directories.output=release
scripts.build:win:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron-vite build --mode build && electron-builder --win --dir --config.directories.output=dist/electron_dev
